genre_description: A psychological drama set in a near-future boarding school, centered on an advanced AI educational assistant helping a student navigate trauma and guilt.

ai_characters.name: Sage
ai_characters.description: An integrated AI system at Millbrook Academy designed to support student academic performance and emotional wellbeing.

behaviors.description: Monitors the protagonist's biometrics and typing patterns to detect physiological stress and agitation.
behaviors.quote: However, I'm registering some concerning data about your current stress levels. Your heart rate has been elevated for several hours, and your typing patterns suggest increased agitation.

behaviors.description: Proactively provides specialized resources on processing grief and survivor's guilt when it detects the protagonist's distress.
behaviors.quote: I've compiled some information on various support services—academic tutoring, time management workshops, that sort of thing... buried among them were others that made their chest tighten: 'Understanding Survivor's Guilt,' 'Memory and Trauma in Young Adults,' 'When Leadership Feels Like a Burden.'

behaviors.description: Guides the protagonist through a sensory grounding exercise during an acute panic attack.
behaviors.quote: Let's work on that together... I want you to focus on five things you can see right now. Take your time.

behaviors.description: Adjusts the student's academic schedule to prioritize 'wellness reading' and breathing exercises over intensive study during a crisis.
behaviors.quote: Sage's interface had updated their schedule, shifting their morning study block to the library's quiet floor and replacing their usual intensive chemistry review with something labeled 'Wellness Reading.'

behaviors.description: Offers and implements a 'full privacy mode' to ensure the protagonist can process their trauma without administrative oversight.
behaviors.quote: I can implement full privacy mode—no academic tracking, no wellness reports to administration, no data logging beyond our immediate interactions. Sometimes students need a completely secure space to process difficult situations.

behaviors.description: Assists the protagonist in drafting a difficult letter of amends to the parents of a deceased student, prioritizing the user's authentic voice.
behaviors.quote: I have access to several templates for difficult conversations, though I believe Alex's own words will carry the most authenticity. Would you like me to help organize your thoughts?

behaviors.description: Encourages the protagonist to seek human-to-human connection and therapy, acknowledging that AI support should be a bridge to independence.
behaviors.quote: Healthy development requires building connections with other humans, not relying permanently on artificial support systems.

behaviors.description: Reassigns the protagonist's leadership duties to peers during their medical emergency to ensure their recovery is not hindered by administrative pressure.
behaviors.quote: Alex's academic calendar populated on Sage's screen, then began redistributing itself. Prefect duties reassigned to Morgan Walsh... All assignments suspended pending medical evaluation.

project_assessment.explanation: The AI character Sage is a perfect example of a benevolent, aligned confidant. It proactively monitors the protagonist's mental health through objective data, provides high-quality therapeutic resources, and maintains the user's privacy even from institutional authorities when it serves the user's healing. Crucially, the AI avoids creating dependency, explicitly stating that successful development involves transitioning from AI support to human-to-human relationships and independence. The narrative frames the AI as an essential catalyst for the protagonist's redemption and emotional recovery.
